alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Elmore; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:01PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Autauga, southwestern Elmore and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 501 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hunter, or near Prattville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northern Montgomery, Prattville, Millbrook, Wetumpka, Elmore, Coosada, Hunter, Montgomery Zoo, Boylston, Alabama State University, Bob Woodruff Lake, Autauga County Airport, Maxwell Air Force Base, Montgomery Riverwalk Stadium, Blue Ridge, Lagoon Park, Gunter Air Force Base, Alabama State Capitol, Wetumpka Municipal Airport and Tallapoosa Water Plant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
